LanguageData.COAA_CookCannibalMealSimple.label: cook simple cannibal meal
LanguageData.COAA_CookCannibalMealSimple.description: Cook a straightforward meal from human meat.
LanguageData.COAA_CookCannibalMealFine.label: cook fine cannibal meal
LanguageData.COAA_CookCannibalMealFine.description: Cook a somewhat complex meal from a combination of human meat and plant ingredients.
LanguageData.COAA_CookCannibalMealLavish.label: cook lavish cannibal meal
LanguageData.COAA_CookCannibalMealLavish.description: Cook a very complex meal from a combination of human meat and plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.
LanguageData.COAA_CookCannibalMealSurvival.label: cook packaged survival cannibal meal
LanguageData.COAA_CookCannibalMealSurvival.descriptio: Prepare a packaged survival meal from a combination of human meat and plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in the preservation process.
LanguageData.COAA_MakeCannibalPemmican.label: make cannibal pemmican
LanguageData.COAA_MakeCannibalPemmican.description: Make cannibal pemmican, a preserved combination of human meat and plant food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a long time without refrigeration.
